Title: Finch in the Dogg House
Plot: Jack discovers Finch and Allie; he fires Finch the next morning.  Two weeks later, Jack has a new secretary, for whom Elliott and Nina cannot decide their feelings for.  Finch wants to come back, but finds a job as Snoop Dogg's assistant when Jack refuses.  After Allie tells Jack the truth about how she came onto Finch, he decides that he wants his old assistant back.
GuestStars: Kristin Bauer, David Raibon, Snoop Dogg, Valerie Curtin
